title: Bound By Blood
description: When sixteen-year-old Rhemy Larousse gets sent off to Rosedown Seminary, an old plantation recently bought, she discovers life in small town St. Francisville, Louisiana, is more than it seems. What was once only forklore and supernatural myths would soon become reality for Rhemy. She starts for the first time to feel like things are going to be okay... until the day she meets Brick Southwood, the boy she has strangely been dreaming about all summer.
author: P.L. Jones
